questions.question: What is the primary function of a compiler?

options.A: To convert high-level programming language to machine language
options.B: To manage the resources of the computer
options.D: To increase the execution speed of the program

questions.question: What type of language translator is a compiler?

options.A: A program that converts entire source code into machine code before execution
options.B: A program that executes code line by line
options.C: A program that only checks the syntax of code
options.D: A program that optimizes memory usage

questions.question: Which phase of a compiler involves lexical analysis?
What is the output of the lexical analysis phase?
Which data structure is used by most compilers for variable storage management?
What is the purpose of the syntax analysis phase?

options.B: To convert tokens into a syntax tree

questions.question: What type of error is detected during the semantic analysis phase of a compiler?
What does the code optimization phase of a compiler aim to improve?

options.B: The execution speed and efficiency of the code
options.C: The size of the compiled code

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a task performed by a compiler?
What is an intermediate code in the context of compiler design?

options.A: The code written by the programmer
options.B: The code executed by the computer
options.C: An abstraction between source and machine code
